content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0) with coal fuel, producing iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-16.0, -49.0) with coal fuel, producing iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) with coal fuel, producing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -47.5) transferring items from the furnace at (-18.0, -49.0).
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -47.5) transferring items from the furnace at (-16.0, -49.0).
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) transferring items from the furnace at (-14.0, -49.0).
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) transferring items from the wooden chest.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -45.5) transferring items from the wooden chest.
- Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -45.5) transferring items from the wooden chest.
- Iron Chest at position (-12.5, -44.5) storing items transferred by the burner inserters.

### Transport Belt System
- Belt group connecting positions (-16.5, -46.5) to (-16.5, -48.5), facilitating the movement of items between furnaces and inserters.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when placing entities too far from the player
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance for placement is 10 units.

### Errors in entity retrieval due to incorrect position
- Verify the position of the entity before attempting to retrieve or interact with it to ensure the entity exists at the specified location.
